channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Ken Burns Is Completely Wrong About the Iroquois
item.description: The Iroquois confederation wasn’t even a democracy. Leaders were selected by women elders, whose status was hereditary.

item.title: Trump’s Terrorist Designation of Muslim Brotherhood Sends Right Message
item.description: Though it isn’t a sweeping designation for the entire organization, the administration has taken a good first step.

item.title: A Blueprint for Ukrainian Surrender
item.description: The draft proposal represents a betrayal for Ukraine and a humiliation for the West.

item.title: Are Americans a People with a Creed, or a Creed-Made People?
item.description: An argument from JD Vance’s nomination speech continues to stir debate.

item.title: My Ancestors Were At The First Thanksgiving, And You Better Believe I’m Proud Of It
item.description: I'll be mindful that all that I do on Thursday is a result of the sacrifices that generations made before me

item.title: Trump’s Reported Obamacare Expansion Is Bad Policy And Worse Politics
item.description: Trump may think this flip-flop will help keep Republicans in control of the House of Representatives, but it’s much more likely to hurt than help.

item.title: The James Comey and Letitia James Cases Go Away, for Now

item.title: What Does The Republican Party Even Stand For?
item.description: Unlike Democrats, Republicans have no unified vision of what they view as success for the country.
